data.author: BLBSOFT Studio

changelog.release_notes:
v4.0 Update Notes:
support round display watch.

v2.0 Update Notes:
1. Background color support multicolor, you can customize the foreground color (support for black and white).
2. You can set the date format.
3. When the Bluetooth connection is interrupted, the weather will use the last cached data.

data.title: BFace
